title: System Software
ziele: Getting familiar with the operation and implementation of central system software components such as memory management, garbage collection, linkers, loaders, debuggers and text editors.
lehrinhalte: Memory management(Mark/Free, Alloc/Dealloc, Buddy system, defragmentation), Garbage Collection (Reference Counting, Mark & Sweep, Mark & Compact, Stop & Copy, generation scavenging, incremental GC, conservative GC), linkers and loaders, debuggers, text editors.
equivalent: <sup><acronym title='Unfortunately this information is not available in english.'>(*)</acronym></sup>INMAWKVSSWA: KV System Software (3 ECTS)
